SEARCH
Package at.htl.timetableGenerator

Class SchoolClass

java.lang.Object
at.htl.timetableGenerator.SchoolClass
public class SchoolClass extends Object
This class represents a school class in a school. A school class is defined by a name, a set of constraints, and a list of weekly courses.
